data.name: Frida Kahlo
data.description: Mexican painter known for self-portraits and works inspired by nature and artifacts of Mexico.

data.name: Georges Seurat
data.description: French post-Impressionist painter known for pointillism and works like 'A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte'.
